titleStmt.title: A pious and seasonable persvvasive to the sonnes of Zion soveraignely usefull for composing their unbrotherly devisions. By a Lover of the Truth, and all those that live godly in Christ Jesus.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 11th 1646"; the '7' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
